name: seafile
description: Seafile is a self-hosted file sync and share platform with high performance and efficient storage. It supports team collaboration, versioning, and desktop/mobile clients.
features: File synchronization: Syncs files across devices with efficient delta transfers and conflict resolution.
Team collaboration: Share libraries with groups for collaborative file management and editing.
Version control: Tracks file history with snapshots and allows rollback to previous versions.
End-to-end encryption: Protects sensitive data with client-side encryption for secure storage.
Desktop clients: Native apps for Windows, macOS, and Linux with selective sync.
Mobile apps: Access and sync files from iOS and Android devices with offline support.
Online editing: Edit documents directly in the browser with integrated office suite.
File locking: Prevents concurrent edits with automatic file locking during modifications.
Sharing controls: Create public or password-protected links with expiration dates.
Storage efficiency: Uses block-level deduplication to minimize storage requirements.
LDAP integration: Connects to existing directory services for centralized user management.
Audit logs: Tracks file access, modifications, and sharing activities for compliance.
